attributes.action: Do not include mandatory vaccines in  any human rights review.
attributes.additional_details: People must retain the right to decline any medical procedure, including vaccines, without being penalised in any way
attributes.background: Government must respect individual rights to bodily autonomy and not mandate vaccines, or impose penalties for those who decline vaccines

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We're not able to accept petitions that do not call for the Government to take a clear and specific action. We're not aware of any proposals to make any medical procedures, including vaccination, mandatory as part of any 'human rights review'. We're therefore not sure how you want what the Government is already doing to change.
